Spellbook¶

The spellbook is a module which defines the spells used in hex_client. These are good models for spells you might want to write. This module also contains some useful helper functions you might want to use in writing your own programs as well.

exception spellbook.InvalidSpellError[source]¶

An error to represent a situation where we have an invalid spell

spellbook.all_lights()[source]¶

Returns a list of all the light numbers

spellbook.fade(colorOne, colorTwo, t)[source]¶

Returns a color partway between colorOne and colorTwo. t=0.0 is fully colorOne, and t=1.0 is fully colorTwo

spellbook.lights_in_ring(ringNumber)[source]¶

Returns a list of all the light numbers in a ring of the hex. The center light is ring 0 and the outer edge is ring 3

spellbook.spell_color(color)[source]¶

Set all the lights to a color

spellbook.spell_flame(backgroundColor, flameColor)[source]¶

Creates a flickering flame at the center of the Hex

spellbook.spell_spirit(backgroundColor, spiritColor)[source]¶

Create a spirit which runs around the outside ring, leaving a trail behind her

spellbook.validate_spell(spell, strict=True)[source]¶

Checks to make sure a spell is valid
